title: Thrilling Wildlife Getaway in the Heart of Bandhavgarh National Park
description: Feel at one with nature with an Escapes Club stay at Lemon Tree Wildlife Resort, Bandhavgarh. Located deep within the Indian jungle, just metres away from the renowned Tala Zone - a famous pocket of the park where the chances of spotting majestic tigers are even higher - this striking resort will take you close to beautiful wildlife and lush jungle. Disconnect from the rest of the world and embrace nature as you rest easy in a premium cottage with daily breakfast and a three-course dinner once during your stay.
offer_address: Village Bhijariya, Post: Bandhavgarh (Tala), District Umaria , Madhya Pradesh-484661

title: All-Inclusive Jungle Experience in Stunning Tree House Near Bandhavgarh Tiger Reserve
description: Venture in the heart of the jungle with Escapes Club: discover the stunning natural beauty of Bandhavgarh Tiger Reserve while staying at the glorious Tree House Hideaway, a collection of five beautifully appointed tree houses nestled amid nature. Includes daily breakfast, lunch and dinner, a romantic bush dinner and one cocktail per person.
location_description: Tree House Hideaway - Bandhavgarh National Park
offer_address: Umaria-Badhavgarh Road, Umaria District, Vijarhia, Madhya Pradesh 484661, India

title: Indiaâ€™s Finest Wilderness Escape with Gourmet Inclusions
description: Escapes Club invites you to discover the stunning natural beauty of Kanha Tiger Reserve in Madhya Pradesh - a national park home to tigers, leopards, sloth bears and more. Immerse yourself in nature staying at the nearby Kanha Earth Lodge, a luxury eco-lodge with a gorgeous infinity pool. Enjoy two or three nights in a rustic open-fronted bungalow with all meals, one private bush dining experience, a nature walk with a trained naturalist and a complimentary bottle of wine on arrival.
offer_address: Kanha Earth Lodge, Kanha National Park, Village - Narna, P.O. Sarkeha, Tehsil Baihar, Dist - Balaghat, Madhya Pradesh - 481111

title: Discover the UNESCO World Heritage-Listed Khajuraho Temples
description: Discover the UNESCO World Heritage-listed Hindu and Jain temples of historic Khajuraho and visit Panna National Park, famous for its tigers. Spend two nights at the Radisson Hotel Khajuraho and enjoy daily breakfast, one buffet lunch, one buffet dinner and spa credit.
